title: 5th Annual AgMIP Global Workshop
description:
The 5th AgMIP Global Workshop provides an opportunity to share progress, new understanding, and lessons learned in AgMIP’s numerous research activities. Participation of AgMIP’s broad diversity of partners facilitates sharing of important results, advancement of initiatives underway, development of new collaborative research activities, and dialog and planning for AgMIP coordinated global and regional climate impact assessments in support of the IPCC 6th Assessment Report (AR6) and other major community initiatives.

For MODEXTREME, presentation of the BioMA platform by Ioannis Athanasiadis: “Enhancing model reuse via component-centered modeling frameworks: the BioMA platform“. Gianni Bellocchi also presented two posters from WP1: “Spatial extension of heat and drought stress in European wheat producing areas“, “Impact of extreme meteorological events on crop yield: a common framework approach“.

venue.address: Emerson Alumni Hall (EAH), 1938 W. University Avenue

address.streetAddress: Emerson Alumni Hall (EAH), 1938 W. University Avenue
